name: righteous1
title: Emcee: Righteous1 | FlipTop Battle League
reppin: Project Stealth, Konektado, Arezo, FMCC Souljahs
description: Not even his disability can stop him from being a dope emcee. Righteous1 debuted at the Sabulong Sumulong event in 2010, wining in dominant fashion against Kahir. He may have more losses than wins now, but his dedication to the scene served as inspiration to the younger generation.
